languages.text: "Тридцать четыре поколения моей семьи служили в стенах Администратума. Мне дали наиболее подходящее потомственному писцу имя". {n}Префект взирает на вас не мигая, или начисто игнорируя ваш непочтительный тон, или действительно его не заметив.{/n}

"For thirty-four generations, my family has served in the Adeptus Administratum. I was given a name befitting one who comes from a long line of scribes." {n}The prefect looks at you without blinking — she is either ignoring your disrespectful tone or has genuinely failed to notice it.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Тридцать четыре поколения моей семьи служили в стенах Администратума. Мне дали наиболее подходящее потомственному писцу имя". {n}Префект взирает на вас не мигая, или начисто игнорируя ваш непочтительный тон, или действительно его не заметив.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "For thirty-four generations, my family has served in the Adeptus Administratum. "For thirty-four generations, my family has served in the Adeptus Administratum. I was given a name befitting one who comes from a long line of scribes." {n}The prefect looks at you without blinking — she is either ignoring your disrespectful tone or has genuinely failed to notice it.{/n}

languages.text: « Pour votre gouverne, sachez que ma famille sert l'Adeptus Administratum depuis trente-quatre générations. Mon nom est celui de la digne héritière d'une longue lignée de scribes. » {n}La préfète vous observe sans ciller. Impossible pour vous de deviner si elle a sciemment choisi d'ignorer votre manque de respect ou si elle ne l'a tout simplement pas remarqué.{/n}
languages.original_text: "For thirty-four generations, my family has served in the Adeptus Administratum. I was given a name befitting one who comes from a long line of scribes." {n}The prefect looks at you without blinking — she is either ignoring your disrespectful tone or has genuinely failed to notice it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pour votre gouverne, sachez que ma famille sert l'Adeptus Administratum depuis trente-quatre générations. Mon nom est celui de la digne héritière d'une longue lignée de scribes. » {n}La préfète vous observe sans ciller. Impossible pour vous de deviner si elle a sciemment choisi d'ignorer votre manque de respect ou si elle ne l'a tout simplement pas remarqué.{/n}

languages.text: «Mi familia ha servido al Adeptus Administratum durante treinta y cuatro generaciones. Me dieron un nombre digno de una larga estirpe de escribas, ¡y lo porto con dignidad!». {n}La prefecta te mira sin pestañear. O está ignorando tu falta de respeto o no se ha dado cuenta de ella.{/n}
languages.original_text: "For thirty-four generations, my family has served in the Adeptus Administratum. I was given a name befitting one who comes from a long line of scribes." {n}The prefect looks at you without blinking — she is either ignoring your disrespectful tone or has genuinely failed to notice it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi familia ha servido al Adeptus Administratum durante treinta y cuatro generaciones. Me dieron un nombre digno de una larga estirpe de escribas, ¡y lo porto con dignidad!». {n}La prefecta te mira sin pestañear. O está ignorando tu falta de respeto o no se ha dado cuenta de ella.{/n}

languages.text: “我的家族有三十四代成员在帝国内政部工作。我在无数缮写员之中脱颖而出，得到了与我的职责相称的名字。”{n}行政官直直地盯着你，眼睛一眨不眨。要么是她没听出来你语气中调侃的意味，要么是她刻意忽略了这一点。{/n}
languages.original_text: "For thirty-four generations, my family has served in the Adeptus Administratum. I was given a name befitting one who comes from a long line of scribes." {n}The prefect looks at you without blinking — she is either ignoring your disrespectful tone or has genuinely failed to notice it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我的家族有三十四代成员在帝国内政部工作。我在无数缮写员之中脱颖而出，得到了与我的职责相称的名字。”{n}行政官直直地盯着你，眼睛一眨不眨。要么是她没听出来你语气中调侃的意味，要么是她刻意忽略了这一点。{/n}

languages.text: "Meine Familie dient dem Adeptus Administratum seit vierunddreißig Generationen. Ich erhielt einen Namen, der auf eine lange Geschichte von Schreibern zurückgeht." {n}Die Präfektin betrachtet dich regungslos ... sie ignoriert deinen respektlosen Ton oder hat ihn nicht bemerkt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "For thirty-four generations, my family has served in the Adeptus Administratum. I was given a name befitting one who comes from a long line of scribes." {n}The prefect looks at you without blinking — she is either ignoring your disrespectful tone or has genuinely failed to notice it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Meine Familie dient dem Adeptus Administratum seit vierunddreißig Generationen. Ich erhielt einen Namen, der auf eine lange Geschichte von Schreibern zurückgeht." {n}Die Präfektin betrachtet dich regungslos ... sie ignoriert deinen respektlosen Ton oder hat ihn nicht bemerkt.{/n}

languages.text: 「私の家系は34代にわたり帝国行政局に仕えてきました。律法学者の家系にふさわしい名を授かっております」{n}総監はまばたきもせずにあなたを見つめていた。無礼な口調を無視しているのか、それとも本当に気づいていないのだろうか。{/n}
languages.original_text: "For thirty-four generations, my family has served in the Adeptus Administratum. I was given a name befitting one who comes from a long line of scribes." {n}The prefect looks at you without blinking — she is either ignoring your disrespectful tone or has genuinely failed to notice it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私の家系は34代にわたり帝国行政局に仕えてきました。律法学者の家系にふさわしい名を授かっております」{n}総監はまばたきもせずにあなたを見つめていた。無礼な口調を無視しているのか、それとも本当に気づいていないのだろうか。{/n}

languages.text: "Ailem, otuz dört kuşaktır Adeptus Administratum'da görev yapıyor. Bana uzun bir kâtip soyundan gelen birine yaraşır bir isim verildi." {n}Prefekt, gözünü kırpmadan sana bakıyor. Ya saygısız üslubunu görmezden geliyor ya da henüz farkına varmadı.{/n}
